thread.title: Liberty-Freedom tripleheader in the spotlight tonight on lehighvalleylive
thread.title_full: Liberty-Freedom tripleheader in the spotlight tonight on lehighvalleylive

title: Liberty-Freedom tripleheader in the spotlight tonight on lehighvalleylive
text:
Freedom and Liberty will lock up in a three-sport tripleheader on Thursday. (lehighvalleylive.com file photo) By lehighvalleylive sports staff View/Post Comments 
Bethlehem rivals Liberty and Freedom meet on the turf of BASD Stadium Thursday night in a tripleheader (weather permitting). 
Lehighvalleylive will have complete coverage of the varsity action in field hockey (4 p.m.), girls soccer (5:30 p.m.) and boys soccer (7:15 p.m.). 
The Hurricanes and Patriots clash to give their school an early advantage in the battle for the Liberty-Freedom bell, which is decided by the rivals’ head-to-head record. Freedom currently has a 1-0 lead in 2015-16 after a victory in golf. 
Check back tonight for stories, photos and videos (assuming our reporters aren’t washed out) from the action in Bethlehem.
